entry.title: Ordinals BIP PR
entry.summary:
The email discusses the purpose of BIPs (Bitcoin Improvement Proposals) and questions why they are necessary instead of allowing individuals to publish their ideas on their own web pages. The sender agrees that people can maintain BIPs in their own repositories and suggests listing all the BIPs that are not maintained in the https://github.com/bitcoin/bips repository. The email is signed off with the sender's name and the mention of Proton Mail as the secure email platform used.
In this context, the main topic revolves around the purpose and necessity of BIPs. The sender raises the question of why there is a need for BIPs instead of allowing individuals to publish their ideas on their own web pages. There is an agreement that BIPs can be maintained in personal repositories, but the suggestion is made to create a list of BIPs that are not maintained in the official Bitcoin repository on GitHub. The email is signed off with the sender's name and the mention of using Proton Mail for secure communication.
